thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mrs Stevenson
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mrs Stevenson

author: Mrs Stevenson
title: Mrs Stevenson
text: Item arrived faulty. Has taken a week for any of my calls to be returned. Am now being accused of having worn the faulty item despite having contacted customer services the afternoon the item was delivered to report the fault. They refuse to replace faulty goods and are saying that even if I return the item to them I may not get a refund! Shocking customer service.
